caption.title: Increasing agricultural and hydrologic drought conditions.
caption.p: ( A) Annual soil moisture deviation from the baseline period average for RCP8.5. ( B) Annual soil moisture deviation from the baseline period average for RCP4.5. ( C) Annual streamflow deviation from the baseline period average for RCP8.5. ( D) Annual streamflow deviation from the baseline period average for RCP4.5. The red shaded region indicates the dry zone. The two red lines indicate 1 and 2 SD levels below the baseline period average.
